    • Method Detail

      • interceptCall

        public <ReqT,RespT> ServerCall.Listener<ReqT> interceptCall(String method,
                                                   ServerCall<RespT> call,
                                                   Metadata.Headers requestHeaders,
                                                   ServerCallHandler<ReqT,RespT> next)
        Description copied from interface: ServerInterceptor
        Intercept ServerCall dispatch by the next ServerCallHandler. General semantics of ServerCallHandler.startCall(java.lang.String, io.grpc.ServerCall<ResponseT>, io.grpc.Metadata.Headers) apply and the returned ServerCall.Listener must not be null.

        If the implementation throws an exception, call will be closed with an error. Implementations must not throw an exception if they started processing that may use call on another thread.

        Specified by:
        interceptCall in interface ServerInterceptor
        Parameters:
        method - fully qualified method name of the call
        call - object to receive response messages
        next - next processor in the interceptor chain
        Returns:
        listener for processing incoming messages for call, never null.
